components/products/price-product:
{{!-- There are 2 code paths for generating the PDP pricing HTML determined by the following #and condition. If a 'price_range' exists then we generate all HTML in price-range.html, otherwise it is defined here. Both code paths generate the same HTML structure with some differences in whether that element is displayed by default (css styling). If you are making a change here or in price-range.html, you probably want to make that change in both files. --}} {{#and price.price_range (if theme_settings.price_ranges '==' true)}} {{> components/products/price-range price=price schema_org=schema_org}} {{else}} {{#if price.without_tax}}
{{theme_settings.pdp-retail-price-label}} {{price.rrp_without_tax.formatted}}
{{theme_settings.pdp-price-label}} {{theme_settings.pdp-sale-price-label}} {{price.without_tax.formatted}} {{{ lang 'products.tax' tax_label=(lang 'products.excluding_tax') }}}{{ lang 'products.tax_exc' }} {{#if schema_org}}
{{/if}} {{#if price.with_tax}} {{lang 'products.price_without_tax' tax_label=price.tax_label}} {{/if}}
{{theme_settings.pdp-non-sale-price-label}} {{price.non_sale_price_without_tax.formatted}}
{{/if}} {{#if price.with_tax}}
{{theme_settings.pdp-retail-price-label}} {{price.rrp_with_tax.formatted}}
{{theme_settings.pdp-price-label}} {{theme_settings.pdp-sale-price-label}} {{price.with_tax.formatted}} {{price.non_sale_price_with_tax.formatted}} {{{ lang 'products.tax' tax_label=(lang 'products.including_tax') }}}{{ lang 'products.tax_inc' }} {{#if schema_org}}
{{/if}} {{#if price.without_tax}} {{lang 'products.price_with_tax' tax_label=price.tax_label}} {{/if}}
{{theme_settings.pdp-non-sale-price-label}} {{price.non_sale_price_with_tax.formatted}}
{{/if}} {{#if page_type '===' 'product'}}
{{lang 'products.you_save_opening_text'}} {{price.saved.formatted}} {{lang 'products.you_save_closing_bracket'}}
{{/if}} {{/and}}
